Posts.Content: Feb 13, 2008 05:00PM kedge5 wrote: dkelly, I can totally understand what you are going through.  I had pain and swelling in left breast and went to my gyn and told me to go have a cyst drained asap.  I was having the doc do the ultrasound and he saw nothing.  No one could explain the lump.  You can feel it but there is nothing on any of the test.  They have put me on tamoxifen to relieve the pain and swelling and no such luck.  This has gone on since Oct 07.  I am actually at my wits end.  So please keep me updated on your condition as well.  Maybe we can figure out whats wrong with us.  Glad to hear Im not alone in this problem. Hugs, Kedge5 (Karen)
Posts.Title: "Invisible" lump dkelly momster
